title: ⚔Byzantine Generals’ Problem
desc: What is the Byzantine generals’ problem and how did Satoshi solve it?

msgs.text: What is the Byzantine generals’ problem and how did Satoshi solve it?
The Byzantine generals’ problem is not being able to trust the message from the messenger, as it may not be valid or truthful.
Thanks Satoshi for solving this problem!
It’s a solid video; I like his content a lot, lots of brain food stuff
"Idempotency key"...interesting that I've never heard this word used in Bitcoin land. Not mentioned in the Whitepaper either. It's the idea of public key/private key cryptography though, right?
